mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, title, content, emotion, created_at, updated_at FROM diary ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, member_id, title, content, emotion, created_at, updated_at FROM diary WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (member_id, title, content, emotion, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{emotion}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE diary SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, emotion = #{emotion}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
